meanings.definition: To cause fear or dread in
meanings.sent1: The loud thunderstorm afears my dog.
meanings.sent2: I afear the dark alley at night.
meanings.sent3: The tiny mouse afears the mighty lion.
meanings.sent4: The thought of failure afears me like a shadow.
meanings.sent5: The haunted house afears all who dare to enter.

meanings.sent2: I afear spiders more than any other creature.
meanings.sent3: The brave knight jokingly afears the tiny mouse.
meanings.sent4: Her piercing scream afears the silence of the night.
meanings.sent5: The howling wind afears the old oak tree.
